sentence: Beautiful pool area palm trees private cabanas and fun polside bar
If you do not want to gamble you have the spa pool music relaxing bars for drinks and many great places to eat
The hotel pool area is lovely
Pool area was very nice with great towelsVery expensive room rates for a casino hotel
i know staff well and most are friendly but my last few experiences consistently have not been and for Becky a bartender who works early morning pool bar
The pool and hot tub were amazing and all the pool staff employees were wonderful
We have stayed at the hotel complimentary rooms and staff was wonderful rooms were great my kids love the pool and the buffet Thanks for making these New Yorkers feel welcome
Beautiful pool and amenities
love the High Limit Room and the VIP area that we were able to enjoyGod Food at the Hard Rock CaféWe traveled on a Monday Tuesday and Wednesday so it was not too crowded and the pool was BEAUTIFUL

It has a Living area A Sitting Area A Bar Coffee Area and the Bathroom offered both a Private Toilet as well as a Large Stall Shower and Jacuzi Tub that could dit two adults the cool part was that the tub had a sliding glass wall into the Living Room
If you can do without a pool it is an awesome place when they finalize their project it will be awesome
Ok for short stay only as at present no pool
We paid top dollar and the pool wasclosed
I miss the pool bar too
We have been so looking forward to 3 days of gambling eating drinking and relaxing by the pool
During this period the pool and fitness center are closed
Pool was a lot nicer before remodel
Toilet ran all night music outside in pool area for two hours I was trying to work you could not hear anything
Also pool closes at sunset so winter months will not be worth it
The people attending to the pool area went above and beyond in terms of customer service
The hotel amenities like the gym and pool were closed due to the continuing renovations on the property
I had a BLAST out on the balcony dancing to the DJ and later had a bunch of ladies come up to me at the pool and ask was that you dancing up on the balcony

Hotel is beautiful room top notch casino fantastic the restaurants is another story for the price you charge I was expecting great food instead I got burned bread on club sand in pool bar in the deli grouper was so overcooked it was dry and dark brown crust fried rice was dry and tasteless but plentiful food court was awful pizza all bread no taste general chicken all breading and tasteless loved hotel but next time will definitely will eat outside hotel
Very noisy by the pool due to road noise room and corridors stank of stale smoke made our clothes stinkRom nice but smoke smell was really bad
Pool does not have a single wow factor
I had lunch at the pool bar restaurant
Ca n’t eat by pool
